Title: Lead, Follow, Or Get Out of the Way
Plot: As Bette has hard time adjusting to the ascetic lifestyle at the Buddhist retreat, Tina goes on a date with a divorced man. Dana, friends again with Alice, is looking forward to a new career. Jenny throws a benefit party for Max but is appalled by his increasingly aggressive behavior. Meanwhile, Carmen tells the truth to her family, and Helena is served with a lawsuit.
GuestStars: Tracy Bonham,  Yvonne Myers,  Tara Fynn,  Holly Dignard,  Eileen Bui,  Callum Keith Rennie,  Steven Eckholdt,  Elena Murzello,  Alex Ferris,  Irene Olga Lopez,  Maria Dimou,  Patricia Mayen-Salazar,  Susan Love
